text: Hagi aka tima nenazageno antahintahi zamimo'ma savari'ma hige'za amanage hu'naze, Samsonina avre atiraminkeno mago'aza huno tazeri musena hino, hu'za hazageno Samsonina kina nompintira avre atirami'za noma azeri'nea zafaramimofo amu'nompi ome antageno oti'neno mago'azana huno zamazeri musena hu'ne.
